entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 2:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
